intro_title: Collect and memorise words to up your vocabulary
profile_dialog_message_deleteAccountWarn: Once this account is deleted it is irreversable. You will lose all your data.
about_introduction: This is an app that allows you to save interactive vocabulary lists that are meant to help you memorise them.
vocablists_dialog_messsage_deleteListWar: You'll lose all data of list '{{listName}}'.
vocablists_joyride_content_menu: Checkout the navigation to access your profile or read about this app.
vocablists_joyride_content_createVocabLi: Click this button to create your first list.
vocablists_joyride_content_enterTitle: Think of a good name for list such as "My English to French List".
vocablists_joyride_content_uploadFile: If you have a Googe Translate Excel-file, you can upload it, if not, simply ignore this step.
vocablists_joyride_content_addVocabList: Almost there, now all you need to do is press the button.
vocablists_joyride_content_yourVocabList: You have now created a new list.
vocablists_joyride_content_editVocabList: Edit the title of your list here anytime.
vocablists_joyride_content_deleteVocabLi: Delete your list using this button here, whenever you feel like it.
vocablist_form_placeholder_targetText: Please Enter a Word or Phrase
vocablist_message_sessionCompleted: You have successfully completed this session.
vocablist_joyride_content_home: Click this button to see all your vocabulary lists.
vocablist_joyride_content_addVocab: Now let us create our first vocabulary.
vocablist_joyride_content_createVocab: The first tab allows us to create a single vocabulary.
vocablist_joyride_content_uploadVocabLis: The second tab allows us to add a whole list of vocabularies which must be exported by Google translate.
vocablist_joyride_content_createVocabInt: We will now guide you how to translate a text and add it to your vocabulary collection.
vocablist_joyride_content_selectSourceLa: This is the language to translate from, which is the app's language but can always be changed.
vocablist_joyride_content_enterSourceTex: Think of a word or phrase that you want to translate.
vocablist_joyride_content_selectTargetLa:
This is the language who want to translate to. 
Once it has been selected the app will remember it for other translations.
vocablist_joyride_content_selectTargetTe: This is the translation we have received, you could also enter a word or phrase manually.
vocablist_joyride_content_translateText: Once you press the button, you will receive a translation shortly. After you have, press next.
vocablist_joyride_content_createVocabBut: Once you press the button, you will vocabulary will be created.
vocablist_joyride_content_newVocabCreate: You have just created a new vocabulary. Well done!
vocablist_joyride_content_selectVocabEnt: By selecting one or multiple entries you will be able to delete them or create a new list from them.
vocablist_joyride_content_editVocabEntry: Press this button whenever you want edit your entry.
vocablist_joyride_content_deleteVocabEnt: Press this button whenever you want delete entries.
vocablist_joyride_content_createVocabLis: Here you can create a list from your selected items.
vocablist_joyride_content_playmodeIntro: Over here you will be able to practice and memorise your words and phrases.
vocablist_joyride_content_playmodeSource: This is the language in which the source text will be shown to you.
vocablist_joyride_content_playmodeTarget: This is the language in which you will have to write your translations.
vocablist_joyride_content_playmodeProgre: Displays the amount vocabularies and how far you are.
vocablist_joyride_content_playmodeSource: Displays the word or phrase you have to translate.
vocablist_joyride_content_playmodeTarget: This is the field where you have to enter the translation. Just to let you know the field is colour sensitive. When your translation is correct this field will turn blue and you can continue, if it is wrong it will be red.
vocablist_joyride_content_playmodeSubmit: This button will be enabled when the target text field has been filled out.
vocablist_joyride_content_playmodeBackBu: Use this button to go back to the previous flash card.
vocablist_joyride_content_playmodeForwar: This button is disabled and will be active once you get the translation right.
vocablist_joyride_content_revealAnswer: While this button is pressed, it will show the answer.
vocablist_joyride_content_refreshSession: Press this button to restart the session.
vocablist_joyride_content_enterPlayMode: This switch is now enabled and will take you to the Play Mode, where our tour will continue.
messages_error_usernameTaken: This username is taken, please choose another one.
messages_error_usernameRequirements: Username can contain regular characters, numbers, underscores, dots and hyphens.
messages_error_emailCouldNotBeUpdated: Email of user {{username}} could not be updated.
messages_error_emailTaken: This email is taken, please choose another one.
messages_error_passwordMinLength: Password must be at least {{passwordMinLength}} characters long.
messages_error_passwordMaxLength: Password must not be longer than {{passwordMaxLength}} characters.
messages_error_passwordMustContain: Password must contain at least one number, one uppercase and one special character.
messages_error_passwordMustContainUpperc: Password must contain at least one uppercase character.
messages_error_passwordMustContainLowerc: Password must contain at least one lowercase character.
messages_error_passwordMustContainSpecia: Password must contain at least one special character.
messages_error_passwordMustContainNumber: Password must contain at least one numeric digit.
messages_error_passwordsNotMatching: Your passwords aren't matching, please re-enter.
messages_error_titleNotValid: This is not a valid title.
messages_error_titleMinMaxLength: The title must be between {{titleMinLength}} and {{titleMaxLength}} characters.
messages_error_sourcePhraseEmpty: Please enter a word or phrase.
messages_error_sourcePhraseMaxLength: The source phrase/word length exceeds the limit.
messages_error_targetPhraseMaxLength: The target phrase/word length exceeds the limit.
messages_error_fileTypeIncorrect: Please choose the correct file type '.xls(x)' or '.csv'.
messages_error_input_text_minLength: Text must be at least {{minLength}} characters long.
messages_error_input_password_minLength: Password must be at least {{minLength}} characters long.
messages_error_input_email_minLength: Email must be at least {{minLength}} characters long.
messages_error_input_text_maxLength: Text must not be longer than {{maxLength}} characters.
messages_error_input_password_maxLength: Password must not be longer than {{maxLength}} characters.
